title: Practical Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course for Managers via Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and managerial experience in workplace settings
context.additional_context: Strengthens competencies in utilizing mobile learning tools within smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three mathematics-related decision-making requirements within an organization using a mobile survey tool.
Learners can process work data and interpret results using a smartphone-based statistical analysis app.
Learners can acquire and apply more than two mathematical problem-solving strategies to real-world cases via a mobile learning platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
